text_block_list.text:
Narita Taishin has a short stride, but<n>the rush she gets in the
homestretch<n>is fierce. More than anything else,<n>she longs
to win.

A bit of searching reveals a video of a<n>race she ran before
applying to<n>Tracen.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

Her expression has no hint of<n>impatience. She's running<n>
comfortably in the back, calm and<n>controlled.

She takes it slow. Usually, letting the<n>frontrunners save their
energy for the<n>final sprint would be a mistake.
But in one beautiful stroke, she flips<n>those odds around.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Gaaaaagh!

With a burst of fearsome strength,<n>she tears away from the
pack.
She rages forward like a storm, and<n>takes the win!
I scramble through Taishin's portfolioto check the times. Her speed in thefirst half isn't anything special, butthe second half...

The last three furlongs are incredibly<n>fast for this type of
race!

She got impatient at the tryouts and<n>wasted her energy
early on, so she<n>didn't have enough to sustain her<n>last
spurt.
choice_data_list: (If she saves her stamina, she can do it!)

text_block_list.text:
It's early to be thinking strategy, but I<n>can't help tracking
Taishin down.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: You're the trainer from yesterday...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh! You're the trainer who was with<n>Taishin last night!
Could this be what I<n>think it is?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You're here to scout her?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: What?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
The hell does that mean? I flipped out<n>on you last night. Why
would...

She looks at me perplexed, and I tell<n>her about the race
footage I watched.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Uh huh... So?
choice_data_list: I want us to seize victory together!
I want us to seize victory together!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'm so...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Oh no...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I-I'm, I'm... I'm sho touuuched!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Let's gooo! This trainer's got the<n>stuff! Taishin, this one's
speciaaal!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Please... You think everyone's<n>special.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: So?! Are you gonna accept?! Are you<n>gonna team up?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Wh-why would I pair up with this<n>weirdo?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
A shame. All would have sailed<n>smoothly if only you were
on board.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Wha?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Sorry to intrude. I have a pressing<n>matter at hand, and I
need your<n>assistance, Narita Taishin.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Pre... President?!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
To cut straight to the point, I have<n>received multiple reports
that you are<n>unfit for Tracen Academy.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The reasons are many: your recent<n>lackluster results,
concerns for your<n>wellbeing, and—however noble the<n>
intention—your repeated disregard for<n>curfew.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I presented counterarguments on<n>your behalf, but as
matters stand... I<n>must ask you to aid me yourself.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: My... self?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes. You see, the concerns about you<n>were voiced
predominantly by<n>academy faculty.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The simplest way to convince them is<n>to offer proof of your
abilities.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Please, endeavor to dispel the<n>accusations against you,
Narita<n>Taishin.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
("Dispel the accusations," she says...<n>How the hell am I
supposed to pull<n>that off?)

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: NOOOOO! We can't let them expel you,<n>Taishiiin!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: T-Ticket, you... Don't tell me you were<n>eavesdropping!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'd NEVER! I was just listening<n>intently!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: That's exactly what eavesdropping<n>is...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Indeed. But the situation is more dire<n>than I expected.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hayahide?! Not you too!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I'm surrounded...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Now, if we are to achieve what the<n>president indicated, there
is but one<n>path available.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, there's a way?! You're<n>amazing, Hayahideee! Just
say the<n>word! How can we help?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I really don't see why you're so<n>worked up about this.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
If we are to inspire high expectations<n>of your racing
potential, it follows that<n>we must demonstrate it on the track.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
We need to gather people for a<n>scrimmage. The two of us
will join as<n>well.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeeeah! That's perfect! Let's do this,<n>Taishin!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
You think I need your pity? That I<n>need you to throw a race
just to get a<n>win?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Not for a second. Putting me aside,<n>you should know well
that there's<n>one racer here who doesn't know<n>the
meaning of holding back.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Well... I guess...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
The reason we are trying to help is<n>quite simple. Though that
which is<n>simple is often difficult to put in<n>words.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
So forget it. I look forward to seeing<n>you at the scrimmage,
Taishin.
